name: ore-unlimited-fixed
title: Ore Unlimited
description: This is a forked version of the original mod (https://mods.factorio.com/mod/ore-unlimited) by No0Vad: https://mods.factorio.com/user/No0Vad updated to fix ores from the bobsplates mod not being changed to unlimited correctly.Adds the Ore Unlimited item which allows you to change the ore fields to unlimited, or back to normal with a random amount between 3500 and 10000 by holding SHIFT instead. IMPORTANT! Be sure to restore the ore fields to normal first if you want to remove this mod!
